subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Central Connecticut, which has played for years in the shadow of the mighty Connecticut Huskies, beat Sacred Heart by 74-70 to win the Northeast tournament championship in New Britain, Conn., gaining a berth in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Central Connecticut, which has played for years in the shadow of the mighty Connecticut Huskies, beat Sacred Heart by 74-70 to win the Northeast tournament championship in New Britain, Conn., gaining a berth in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
